channel.title: Help me with summoning?
channel.description:
1st i need to make my music tab show the same/similar thing as the quest tab so i can make it say Level1-Goblin LEvel-5 ZOmbie Level-10 Ghost Etc. How do i do that?
And when you click on it it spawns the monster. - So when u click it it will spawn that monster, like the ::Addnpc command, but i do not want the ::Addnpc command available to every1 so i will rename. I think i got that.
And how do i make a delay so it only lets you spawn a certain ammount per time, like i spawn 1, and it wont let em spawn until its dead or something. How do i do that?
please help,
thanks.

item.title: Help me with summoning?
item.dc:creator: @Ic3_Barrage Ic3 Barrage
item.description:
@Ic3_Barrage wrote:

1st i need to make my music tab show the same/similar thing as the quest tab so i can make it say
Level1-Goblin
LEvel-5 ZOmbie
Level-10 Ghost
Etc. How do i do that?

And when you click on it it spawns the monster. -
So when u click it it will spawn that monster, like the ::Addnpc command, but i do not want the ::Addnpc command available to every1 so i will rename. I think i got that.

And how do i make a delay so it only lets you spawn a certain ammount per time,
like i spawn 1, and it wont let em spawn until its dead or something. How do i do that?

please help,

thanks.
